https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null This is one of the Sueoka's recent series of works, "Reinterpretation for the Private Films" which has been cited from old home movies. The original film was not only describing poetically short summer in Germany 1931, but it was recording lost Germany in pre-war days. A Summer in Germany
